FROM pc_system_resource pc_system_resource LEFT OUTER JOIN pc_system_permission_resource pc_system_permission_resource on pc_system_resource.id = pc_system_permission_resource.resource_id and pc_system_permission_resource.permission_id = #{id} where pc_system_resource.platform = 1
